website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this little powerhouse up to the challenges of numerous cleaning tasks, but it's made by a top manufacturer right here in the U.K.
pros: A versatile vacuum with a lightweight canister design
Boasts the brand's turbo-powered Airobrush that tackles dirt from just about any surface
Works well on most high-pile carpets
Bags can hold 6 litres of debris before needing replaced
cons: Some customers who have owned Henrys in the past say the newer version isn't as durable and has less suction power than its predecessors

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Several friends recommended a Henry. Most commented on his ability to suck which caused a lot of amusement and carry on style laughing. Well Henry arrived. Big smile on his face and he was straight on the job. Never seen my carpet look so good. The turbo head really brings up the pile so well. Henry is indeed the best sucker in the world. Joking aside don’t hesitate to buy. Also like the longer cable. You can clean the whole flat without having to plug him into different rooms as the cable reaches a long way
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lovering

customer_reviews.title: Henry wins my heart
customer_reviews.text: I love my Henry so much I bought my daughter one. Checked to see what all local public buildings with heavy cleaning areas were using The school, the Council Offices and they all swore by their Henry absolutely not disappointed would highly recommend I bought the extra motorized brush and extra bags when I purchased this. My daughter has a dog that molts badly in summer and this cleaner had been a blessing. I would not buy any other now.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought Bosch animal and dyson with lithium batteries! Bosch lasted 45 minutes on eco, and lucky to get 30 minutes out of dyson. Both great for being light weight but we got large 3 bed house and 3 cats!!! Read reviews on Which, and it gave this Henry a 5 star!!!! All I can say is this now my main vacuum and if I want a quick go over it will be the others I use, glad I purchased this product!!!!! It’s fantastic even when using the other accessories the same suction is there unlike the other 2 I mentioned. Don’t hesitate!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Palmer-Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Made for war
customer_reviews.text: If you go to war and need a vacuum cleaner to clean up the mess, Henry is the one for the job. Most of the professionals who work in messy workshops all over the UK, use the help of Henry at the end of the day. If want a vacuum cleaner to show it to your friends, you buy a Dyson. If you want a vacuum cleaner to do the job properly for a long time, you buy a Henry.
customer_reviews.author: Marios P.

customer_reviews.title: Not that it needs the reviews haha
customer_reviews.text: Oh Henry, I originally bought this because of nostalgia but it didn’t let me down! Honestly an amazing hoover and if you are thinking of getting one, DO IT! Sure there are bags, but they are recyclable as will most of the stuff going into your vacuum. Also, if any of it breaks you can simply get a replacement part then watch a YouTube vid on how to fix it, saves you getting a whole new one!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Etchells

customer_reviews.title: Very Good !!!
customer_reviews.text: My last Henry was second hand one . So after 3 years he died . I got a cat soon so I needed something strong and to clean fur too . Very good and strong , is cleaning very good and I am so happy 😀 And îs not that noisy than the other one . Much easier and very strong .
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Henry is the best vacuum cleaner , I had one years ago which I lived but then I went with the trend and got a well known upright. Now I am back with Henry, he cant be beaten. Carpet and hard floors he is the best
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: fantastic suction
customer_reviews.text: its a great hoover its lifted all the dog hair of the carpets and flooring which wouldnt come up with my old dyson, makes the house feel really clean was well worth paying a little extra for the turbo one .
customer_reviews.author: shirlyanne

customer_reviews.title: Suction too strong
customer_reviews.text: Suction too strong with ordinary head, so can't move it across carpet easily, and doesn't pick up fluff well (but it does go under furniture easily). Turbo head does move across carpet easily (as it's on wheels) and it does pick up fluff well, but it's too high to go under my furniture. Easy to detach pipes, but no auto cord rewind and can't change suction strength
customer_reviews.author: The Hungry Meerkat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this after I ordered it. I have cats and have gone through so many cheap hoovers that I finally decided to fork out for a decent one. And it has not disappointed. Doing my stairs used to be an hours work, but henry done it in 5 mins with the Airobrush attachment. He may be a little bulky to do the stairs for an elderly person however. Was just as good on my laminate flooring and tiles too. Absolutely love him and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. This is the third Henry I’ve owned first two were brilliant. Not sure what’s gone on with their production but this one is terrible. Cable management system constantly jams. Metal hose connections come apart. New hard floor attachment scratches floor. I’ve had to replace both for third party replacements. I wouldn’t buy a numatic product again..
customer_reviews.author: Dambuster

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant vacuum. The turbo head actually lifts the pile on my carpet so it doesn't look flat anymore. Very good value for money ,would definitely buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Henry great Hoover
customer_reviews.text: I wish l bought this hoover long time ago.My partner had been nagging me about this make of hoover for a very long time.L am glad I have purchase one now.Excellent hoover
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Absulutly perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies and gentlemen Dont spent your time to look other hoover Just buy Henry Turbo thats it My Wife she is very happy We changed Many hoover finaly we found right one İts perfect its powerfull İts very easy to use Higlyyy recomend to buy henryyyyy Thanks henryyyyy
customer_reviews.author: poyrazxc

customer_reviews.title: Reliable vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Henry. I bought a Vax upright last year but wish I had just gone for the Henry. Great suction, reliable, love the turbo .
customer_reviews.author: I. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my new Hoover! It is extremely powerful and easy to use. It’s not as heavy as old Henry. Really satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisy & Max

customer_reviews.title: A good strong vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner was bought to replace an expensive but insubstantial one, with plastic parts which break too easily. I’m pleased to say that my new one appears to be much more efficient & robust.
customer_reviews.author: WinB

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums really well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smaller Henry. This is the fourth one I've bought for family members, and in my opinion it is just as powerful as my larger,old-style Henry Turbo (the one with dual power levels). The Airo brush is quieter to use than the red Turbo brush that came with our big Henry, and it doesn't get clogged with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It picks up dog hair and is such a good vacuum. I've broken 2 vax ones and remembered my mums old henry lasting years. So pleased. Came with 2 bags and all accessories
customer_reviews.author: Ambles

customer_reviews.title: Little sucker
customer_reviews.text: Powerful vacuum and gets the wifey's hair which other models failed to do. Haven't got carpeted stairs so doesn't get used on them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ford

customer_reviews.title: Hanry you are very strong!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The power of this Hanry model is indescribable. Whether on carpet or hard floors, it vacuums everything in one pass. I have allergy problems and after using Hanry all the dust is gone and finally the house shines and I feel better. At first you may think it is too expensive but its performance pays off.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Carpet clean and fur pickups
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for carpet cleaning and fur removal, plus large waste container, it certainly lives up to its reputation. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: baz

customer_reviews.title: life saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just love it!!! Have carpets everywhere so hair and tiny fur peceases are very where. Before use pick up with a had hair or something stuck on the carpet as hoover wasn't strong enough to take it. But this vacuum cleaner picks it all up you can see from the first use. Light weight, powerful and flexible head to move around furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Aušra

customer_reviews.title: Great machine at great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product was worried about suction power as the kW only half of some other machines but was pleasantly surprised sucks up everything and does not puff out dust at other end unlike some machines I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Rye

customer_reviews.title: Henry is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love Henry, was to easy use, great windable cable, tools store easily and carpets look amazing after the turbo clean.
customer_reviews.author: elaine j

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: After being conned into thinking that cordless vacuums are any good, I've gone back to basics. I bought this one as it's the same as my builder uses. Back to a vacuum that lifts the carpet and actually picks up dirt on carpets or hard floors. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: chrisr

customer_reviews.title: Great value vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and wheels follow the direction of pull easily
customer_reviews.author: C Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, our carpets look new!
customer_reviews.text: Such an improvement, loved the old Henry which we had for years. It died, this one is lighter cleans amazingly well, lets face it just now we are all cleaning more. Definitely would recommend it. Came a week earlier than the estimated date.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Simon J S Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Get a Henry !
customer_reviews.text: Best buy ! Picks up dog hairs easily. Love Henry !
customer_reviews.author: Alison 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great seller fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: tgos is a great product at a great price. Fast delivery. Great
customer_reviews.author: Mind Over Body

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Really good suction as I have two dogs also nice and lightweight easy to handle and handy gadgets
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Horn

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A bit clumsy, but good quality and suction power. Cleans well, and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: very effective vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: To move the vacuum cleaner especially along the staircase is difficult but suction power is excellent. Not very easy to use by elderly people
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir S.

customer_reviews.title: Fab so far
customer_reviews.text: Love my henry. Hope it continues to be as good, as time goes by, as it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Henry! The only issue I have is long hair getting stuck. Simple fix by cutting it away. Over all great Henry! Brilliant power!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Where to get help?
customer_reviews.text: Product cleans very efficiently but occasionally cuts out. Have tried to contact help line but have had no success. Am quite isolated because of Covid 19 so. don’t really know what to do. O8
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The low price was appealing but not the product. Didn’t like its performance and above all it’s all bits and pieces when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Henry Hoover's are the sturdiest, most reliable and best value for money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: A7R7HAYES

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the Henry hoover was poor. The suction was useless and I had to go over the same spot dozens of times to get it to pick up. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H.

customer_reviews.title: Top cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner. Parents have had Henry for years. Brilliant suction.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless one would be better off sucking up the dust with a straw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as ever
customer_reviews.text: Better then any rival always end up back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Gravity

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Is the best vacuum cleaner I ever had. So powerful. I really recommend this 👍
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Nan

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting sales practice
customer_reviews.text: I am so annoyed that I received the wrong item. Sounds like someone was trying to fob me off with a cheaper model for the same price as the upgraded item I paid for. This is quite disgraceful and a nasty sales technique. I am quite disgusted honestly. This is shameful and really appalling.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hurault

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the quality?
customer_reviews.text: Being impressed with my sister's Henry, which she has had for many years, I decided to get my own but it seems that the quality has taken a back seat: from the quality of the plastic and on/off switch; and the bearings of the cord rewind feel as if they are made of pebbles - not as smooth as the old Henry. Suction is superb (better than my Dyson DC01) though, but that collar thingy on the tube that releases the suction needs a gorilla's grip to turn it. I'm going to keep it and use it because it gets to places the Dyson cannot. I'm going to buy the longer hose and the longer flexible crevice tool.
customer_reviews.author: ergoatlantis

customer_reviews.title: It’s brilliant, works great, I still miss my Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good value for money with amazing suction vacuum cleaner. I do disagree with reviews I trusted saying it’s better than dyson. It’s not better than dyson. I used dyson for 28 years and now I find Henry taking so much storage space, not easy to change the head and lot of work to move around. If I didn’t have experience of Dyson, I would’ve loved it, there is nothing wrong with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: I've come back to Henry after a series of epic fails with other hoovers!!
customer_reviews.text: Such joy to be reunited with Henry , although this one is a turbo Henry and my last one ( many years ago) was a regular Henry. ..it still packs a punch and simply hoovers to perfection. Brilliant! I never thought I would get so excited by hoovering with Henry but after other vacuum cleaners I have used, this proves to be the quietest, most powerful and lightweight machine and moves around with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mangrove

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about a Henry A bit difficult to use on the stairs for obvious reasons But he never let's you down with power
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter in weight than previous models
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter in weight than my previous Henry, as usual good suction and comes with good tools. Will wait to see if the build quality lasts as long as previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best better than all the rest
customer_reviews.text: Henry Turbo is simply marvellous especially on carpet to remove pet hair , yes it is not not a bag less vacuum but what you gain in power of suction is worth the expense of buying bags, i will never look at a Dyson again
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good old Henry
customer_reviews.text: Great little hoover suction good can be a bit awkward when cleaning the stairs as the hose reach isn’t that great but overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: excellent product..worth buying
customer_reviews.text: best hoover around...easy to use and pull about...suction great would recommend makes hoovering a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: lady s knight

customer_reviews.title: Best hoover
customer_reviews.text: I have a Henry for work so when my days on packed in I bought a Henry for hone. Love it. Best hoover
customer_reviews.author: Avril Hulme

customer_reviews.title: Good Hoover
customer_reviews.text: It's my second Henry. The last one lasted 15 years,used daily ,its a reliable make
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Henry is hungry for dust etc
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good suction. Makes a meal of the mess
customer_reviews.author: justcarol

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Shows you that the house has been cleaned. Becomes very visibly clean. Great for handling.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Egbeson

customer_reviews.title: Getting one you will be impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great little device should have got one years ago and saved a fortune
customer_reviews.author: Robin Minto

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent doe a wonderful job Henry hoovers are the best
customer_reviews.author: adrian herrera

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Excellent-all I wanted from a hoover and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Terri26

customer_reviews.title: Sucker! :)
customer_reviews.text: This like one does such a great job, with hair or dust. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Shatananda
